channel.title: PvPKillz - Survival & Roleplay | HG | MA | Multi-World | DayZ | Economy
channel.description:
Pvpkillz is a server having many friendly admins who would love to help, Towns/Factions run by regular players, Pvp enabled outside of factions and also inside! Many ways to invest and get money. Friendly players, many things can be done on Pvpkillz Server. Discover Pvpkillz server and all of its secrets! You build factions with friends, and have wars against other factions!
Conquer your enemies & defend your land!
PvP is allowed everywhere, although towns and factions can choose if they would like to have PvP or not enabled.
We run both Survival and Hunger Game worlds!
Join Now: Mc.PvPKillz.com
We run: Factions Precious Stones Hunger Games Multiworld Dynmap Mcmmo LWC Treasure Hunt DynMap Mob Arena
and is these are just some of the many! Everything to protect you and your buildings!
Hope to see you there :)
PvPKillz Website: http://www.Pvpkillz.com/forums PvPKillz Steam Group: http://steamcommunity.com Additional Details A server where the voice of players is heard! We run Survival Game modes, and run many RPG plugins to facilitate your needs in server gaming!
;)

item.description:
@Undeadkillz wrote:

Pvpkillz is a server having many friendly admins who would love to help, Towns/Factions run by regular players, Pvp enabled outside of factions and also inside! Many ways to invest and get money. Friendly players, many things can be done on Pvpkillz Server. Discover Pvpkillz server and all of its secrets! You build factions with friends, and have wars against other factions!

Conquer your enemies & defend your land!

PvP is allowed everywhere, although towns and factions can choose if they would like to have PvP or not enabled.

We run both Survival and Hunger Game worlds!

Join Now: Mc.PvPKillz.com

We run:
